resources.string: Search by kinds of floral species:
Dr.HooeeB is an app That will easily identify the health condition of your bees with your mobile phone. It also can help you search the location of different kinds of bees and floral species.
Queen bee is missing in the hive.
How to upload a right photo?
One clear bee in a photo.
No multiple bee in a photo.

Bees are the most important species in the environment, as they are essential to both pollinate the food we need to survive, and to facilitate the survival of essential habitat for wildlife. However, their numbers in the wild have been dwindling for many years.

People are now increasingly taking up beekeeping which has proven beneficial to local bee populations. It is difficult for new beekeepers however, to identify health issues of bees, as they need a lot of information about beekeeping to manage their hive better. We thus want to encourage more people to get into beekeeping by making it easy and accessible to maintain apiaries and monitor the health of the bees.

Dr.HoneeB allows users to take photos of their bees and get instant feedback on their health and species along with additional information relating to the specific bee species and problems. This allows new beekeepers to have a fast, reliable and efficient way to track health of the hives.
